channel.title: hue on Fatkun's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hue on Fatkun's Blog

item.title: hue cdh5.4.0 编辑器补丁
item.description: 更新文件 /opt/cloudera/parcels/CDH/lib/hue/build/static/oozie/js/workflow-editor.ko.js /opt/cloudera/parcels/CDH/lib/hue/build/static/oozie/js/workflow-editor.ko.xxxxxxxx.js HUE在CENTOS7使用 编译安装python2.6 可能要把旧版本的/usr/lib64/libpython2.6.so.1.0

item.title: hue runcpserver has restarted more than 3 times
item.description: 运行hue时，~/hue/build/env/bin$ ./supervisor 遇到这个错误，查看logs可以看到这句： runcpserver has restarted more than 3 times 解决方法 更改hue/deskt

item.title: gcc: error trying to exec ‘cc1plus’: execvp: 没有那个文件或目录
item.description: 参考http://archive.cloudera.com/cdh/3/hue/manual.html安装hue，首先把那些lib都安装先。
